title: Amazon Prime Day 2021: All the deals that are actually worth your time [Day 2 Update]
content:
Update 6/22 10:55 am EDT: Prime Day has paradoxically rolled into its second day, so we've given our mega-roundup another refresh. As expected, the pace of new discounts has slowed, but we've still found good deals on recommended indoor security cameras, 4K box sets of the Lord of the Rings and The Hobbit trilogies, the latest Spider-Man game for the PS4/PS5, and more.

Update 6/21 5:35 pm EDT: After another sweep of our Prime Day deals roundup, we have struck out a few expired offers, updated prices, and added a few new deals. Those bargains include premium OLED TVs from Sony, well-reviewed air purifiers from Blueair, Blue's popular Yeti microphone, and Samsung SSDs we like, among other discounts you can find below.

Update 6/21 12 pm EDT: We've added our first batch of new discounts, headlined by the return of a deal we highlighted a couple weeks back: those who buy at least $40 in Amazon gift cards can get an extra $10 in Amazon credit at no extra cost. Elsewhere, Apple's latest iPad Air is now down to a joint-low of $520, and we've found new deals on Nvidia's Shield TV, recommended board games Dixit and Mysterium, a good Anker battery pack, and more. Since this post first went live, we've also put together roundups for those looking to spend less than $50 and those who don't subscribe to Prime but still want some savings.
